name: games-on-whales
tagline: A framework for orchestrating containerized Windows gaming environments on Linux
description: WOLF (Whales On Linux Framework) orchestrates Docker containers that simulate Windows gaming environments for Linux. It helps automate game installations via Wine or Proton in self-contained sandboxed setups.

features.title: Cloud Gaming Server
features.description: Streams games from a host machine to remote clients

features.title: GPU Acceleration
features.description: Uses available GPUs for game rendering and streaming

features.title: Container-Based Deployment
features.description: Runs game sessions in isolated containers

features.title: Input Forwarding
features.description: Forwards keyboard mouse and controller input to games

features.title: Audio and Video Streaming
features.description: Streams game audio and video to clients

features.title: Self-Hosted Game Streaming
features.description: Host game streaming on your own servers
